meta.hint:
Some adjectives compare people, animals, places or things.
Comparative adjectives compare two people, animals, places or things. They end in -er. Andy is taller than his sister.
Superlative adjectives compare more than two people, animals, places or things. They end in -est. He is the tallest person in his class.
meta.question: Select the adjective that compares.

content.description: Mary is the _____ person I know.
